amendment.description: Amendment to require the Secretary of Education to report to Congress, every 10 years, on the needs of limited English proficient students using the Free Application for Federal Student Aid.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part A of House Report 113- 546 to require the Secretary of Education to report to Congress, every 10 years, on the needs of limited English proficient students using the Free Application for Federal Student Aid.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Polis.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
